entry.title: An Oracle Of Roses
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,100Chapters: 1/17Kudos: 15

Summary: Arthur Pendragon, Prince Regent of the Albion Empire, always feared he would face an arranged marriage. Now, as he desperately struggles to restore magic in the hopes of saving his sister, the answer is obvious. He must marry Lord Emrys, the scion of a noble, magical line. Both men know their duty. Their union would bring all Albion back into balance, but the world is not a simple place, and neither of them make a good first impression. Will they be able to overcome their doubts, or is their match doomed to fail?

entry.title: Twice Into The Same River
entry.summary:
Author: NephriteJade

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,595Chapters: 21/66Kudos: 41

Summary: In an Albion where the oceans are higher, where Camelot is a port city and pirates plague the seas, Prince Arthur Pendragon struggles under the weight of his duty and his doubts. For almost twenty years he's honed himself to become the sword his father wants him to be, but he's begun to wonder if a ruler relying too much on the sword is more dangerous to his people than any foe.Meanwhile Lady Morgana can no longer avoid the shadows that plague her in her waking hours as well as her dreams, and resolves to save herself from exhaustion and madness. But searching for forbidden knowledge in Camelot can be deadly, even for the king's ward.And Merlin, the prince's manservant, holds more secrets than either of them. Between trying to free the dragon under the castle, protecting Arthur from magical threats that Camelot is no longer capable of grappling with, and keeping his head attached to his shoulders, he can barely keep up with his life as it is. Throwing in prophecies is just excessive.This is a story carried by many hands, because in a land of myth and a time of magic, the destiny of a great kingdom can't be shouldered by any one person alone.

entry.title: Beneath the Roses
entry.summary:
Author: YellingAtPlants

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,510Chapters: 13/15Kudos: 98

Summary: Beneath the Roses, a companion to Not All Dragons and Dandelions, from Morgana and Gwen’s perspective.---Morgana has lived under Uther's oppressive rule for many years - she has learned how to hide, how to be quiet enough to slip under the radar and keep her role in the court. Her brother has been hurt, mentally and physically, but the last straw comes on his birthday, when his soulmate mark never appears. She worries for him, for his future in Camelot.So when the new mute serving boy arrives in Camelot and immediately saves his life, it changes everything.

entry.title: Where The Light Fell
entry.summary:
Author: amariis28

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,400Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 69

Summary: Merlin has lived a hundred lives. A healer. A chef. An architect. A man lost in the quiet rhythm of the world. In the year 2025, he works at a small art museum, curating an exhibit of Arthurian legends. The paintings unsigned, half-forgotten are more than historical curiosities. They are memories. His own. Each brushstroke a thread tied to a man he can’t afford to forget. But even memory fades. After fifteen centuries of waiting, Merlin’s grasp on the past begins to blur until a stranger walks in. A young man with familiar eyes. But the question was, was it really Arthur returned ? Or just another echo — a face that haunts every lifetime?

entry.title: Some and Now None of You
entry.summary:
Author: Isthisusernameavailableornot

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 174,195Chapters: 55/62Kudos: 1,601

Summary: "Let him think I hate him. If that’ll stop him from risking his neck for me over and over again, then it’s a sacrifice I don’t have to think twice about." — Arthur finds out Merlin has magic. He also finds out how often Merlin risked his life for him and so, he does the only thing he can think of to protect him: banishment. Hurt and angry, Merlin leaves and swears to not look back. But, when two years pass and Morgana shows up at Merlin’s door, urging him to fill Gaius’ position as Court Physician, Merlin agrees. He really doesn’t know why, but Arthur is sure Merlin would do just about anything to get on his nerves. Unprepared for the shock of seeing Merlin back in the castle, Arthur is forced to speed along his plans to lift the ban on magic. But between stubborn councilors, a mysterious plague, a still angry Merlin, and Morgana being Morgana, Arthur is fairly certain he’ll lose his mind before the first year of his reign even ends.

entry.title: first, do no harm
entry.summary:
Author: deniigiq

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,810Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 80

Summary: “I want to go home,” Merlin chokes.“Come home,” Arthur beseeches him, stretching his arm as far as he can.He feels the ghost of heat hovering over his palm. He feels it drawing closer until—“No.”He opens his eyes and finds Emrys poised over him with wide-spread fingers and bared teeth.“No,” Emrys says again, this time to Arthur’s face.   (Splintered Merlin AU. In a fit of terror, Arthur kills Merlin and regrets everything immediately. Two years later, he gets a chance to make things right when a man calling himself Emrys wanders back into his closest circle. Arthur thinks that he can make Merlin come back to him if only he treats this Emrys the way he should have treated Merlin. Emrys, meanwhile, isn't interested in alleviating Arthur's guilt. He wants to play out his own fairytale; the problem is that there's a dragon in the way.)

entry.title: The Light Coming Off Your Sails
entry.summary:
Author: manicpixiegoblinxoxo

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,547Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 36

Summary: It should be a simple voyage. Six months, two newly-invented sails to test, one inventor along for the ride to help test them. Not that Merlin had much of a choice - it was either prison or this. As long as he can keep his magic hidden, stop pissing off his pretentious first mate, and navigate the politics on deck, it should be a simple voyage.(Or, the Treasure Planet x Merlin crossover of my 13-year-old dreams. Merlin is a convict, tech prodigy, and secret wizard. Arthur is a perfectionist, sailor aficionado, and secret prince. Ships carry a sort of intrinsic magic from the old days while being outfitted with the technology of the new days. Gwaine is a slut.)

entry.title: A Legend that Begins With a Crush
entry.summary:
Author: Clearwater96

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,657,523Chapters: 107/?Kudos: 1,477

Summary: Arthur Pendragon and Merlin were literally from two different worlds. One is a prince from a great kingdom and the other a common farm boy from the next kingdom over. These two should have never met.But that was before they realized their parents were once friends and arranged the two of them to marry when they reached adulthood. That was before Uther turned on magic and Hunith went on the run with her infant son.Now, twenty years have passed and the Prince, Arthur Pendragon is far out of his depth. After four months of marriage and learning what he has about Merlin, he knows that things need to change, but doesn’t know what can be done.And with every attempt at trying going wrong, with mysterious boys showing up wanting to be a knight, strange physician’s trying to coerce his consort away, even stranger ladies who’ve seen to weaken Arthur’s brain, and the arrival of an odd Druid boy they need to risk it all just to get to safety…will Arthur ever get things to go right?

entry.title: The Prince & The Pauper
entry.summary:
Author: plotcole (Quint_Essentially)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,297Chapters: 7/26Kudos: 20

Summary: Extract from ‘Knights of the Temples: The Prince Arthur Story’ by T. H. Blanc, published 2021: 'There we have it. Violence, intrigue, danger, romance, and self-sacrifice. In a couple of short months, Captain Arthur Pendragon, eldest son of The Most Honourable The Marquess of Camelot, Lord Uther Pendragon, almost singlehandedly dismantled one of the most covert and sinister arms of the Axis Powers’ military forces, ensuring that its leader and the secret weapons she had designed would never again see the light of day. entry.title: King & Court
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 247,846Chapters: 54/100Kudos: 2,592

Summary: Loneliness is an insidious thing. When Merlin looks at Arthur, he sees not just a prince waiting for his time to rule, but a young man struggling to find his place in the world, with little help from anyone else.The truth is, Arthur needs more than the friendship Merlin can offer. He needs people he can trust: men and women who will become his court and his confidants, and if he is going to survive to take the throne and lead Camelot into its golden age, he needs them sooner rather than later.Finding loopholes in Uther’s laws is no easy feat. Court life is a dangerous game, but it’s one Merlin has every intention of winning so that Arthur can have knights of his choosing by his side.And then there is the matter of his magic…

entry.title: ACROSS THE UNIVERSES
entry.summary:
Author: OfTintagel

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,024Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 52

Summary: Arthur, Merlin, Guinevere and the knights accidently end up in another universe. Before they get back to their own universe, they have to travel across multiple universes, meet other versions of themself and deal with their problems. All the while doing it, they also discover a secret each time.
